sql.query:
SELECT user_id, tr_id
FROM tt_recharge_trans
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */

SELECT callbackapi
FROM t_api_token
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{$_POST.tr_status}} */, api_ref = :P2 /* {{$_POST.api_ref}} */, updated_on = :P3 /* {{NOW}} */, operator_ref = :P4 /* {{'Transaction Successful'}} */
WHERE id = :P5 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */

UPDATE tt_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{$_POST.tr_status}} */, updated_on = :P2 /* {{NOW}} */, updated_by = :P3 /* {{identity}} */
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P4 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */

SELECT tt_recharge_trans.opening_balance, tt_balance.user_id, tt_balance.old_balance, tt_balance.amount, tt_balance.new_balance, tt_balance.transaction_type, tt_balance.tr_date, tt_balance.crdr_type, tt_balance.pay_ref_id, tt_balance.remarks, tt_balance.netamt, m_users.balance_amt, m_users.ds_id, m_users.md_id, tt_recharge_trans.dtcommper, tt_recharge_trans.dtcommval, tt_recharge_trans.dtcommamt, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeper, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeval, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeamt, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommper, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommval, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommamt, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeper, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeval, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeamt
FROM tt_recharge_trans AS tt_recharge_trans
LEFT JOIN tt_balance AS tt_balance ON (tt_balance.pay_ref_id = tt_recharge_trans.id) LEFT JOIN m_users AS m_users ON (m_users.id = tt_recharge_trans.user_id)
WHERE tt_recharge_trans.id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{$_POST.tr_status}} */, api_ref = :P2 /* {{$_POST.api_ref}} */, updated_on = :P3 /* {{NOW}} */, closing_balance = :P4 /* {{GetTrInfo.opening_balance}} */, operator_ref = :P5 /* {{'Transaction Failed'}} */
WHERE id = :P6 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */

UPDATE tt_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{$_POST.tr_status}} */, updated_on = :P2 /* {{NOW}} */, updated_by = :P3 /* {{identity}} */
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P4 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */

INSERT INTO tt_balance
(user_id, old_balance, amount, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on, netamt, status) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetTrInfo.user_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetTrInfo.balance_amt}} */, :P3 /* {{GetTrInfo.amount}} */, :P4 /* {{RtClosingBal}} */, :P5 /* {{GetTrInfo.transaction_type+' Refund'}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, :P7 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P8 /* {{'Credit'}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */, :P10 /* {{GetTrInfo.remarks}} */, :P11 /* {{identity}} */, :P12 /* {{NOW}} */, :P13 /* {{GetTrInfo.netamt}} */, :P14 /* {{'REFUND'}} */)

UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{RtClosingBal}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetTrInfo.user_id}} */

SELECT user_id, old_balance, amount, netamt, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks
FROM t_charge_cal AS t_charge_cal
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */ AND user_id = :P2 /* {{GetTrInfo.ds_id}} */

SELECT balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetTrInfo.ds_id}} */

INSERT INTO t_charge_cal
(user_id, old_balance, amount, netamt, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetTrInfo.ds_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetDTBal.balance_amt}} */, :P3 /* {{GetTrInfo.amount}} */, :P4 /* {{GetDtComm.netamt}} */, :P5 /* {{DTClosingBal}} */, :P6 /* {{GetDtComm.transaction_type+' Reversal'}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, :P8 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P9 /* {{'Debit'}} */, :P10 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */, :P11 /* {{GetDtComm.remarks}} */, :P12 /* {{identity}} */, :P13 /* {{NOW}} */)

UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{DTClosingBal}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetTrInfo.ds_id}} */

SELECT user_id, old_balance, amount, netamt, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks
FROM t_charge_cal AS t_charge_cal
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */ AND user_id = :P2 /* {{GetTrInfo.md_id}} */

SELECT balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetTrInfo.md_id}} */

INSERT INTO t_charge_cal
(user_id, old_balance, amount, netamt, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetTrInfo.md_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetMDTBal.balance_amt}} */, :P3 /* {{GetTrInfo.amount}} */, :P4 /* {{GetMDtComm.netamt}} */, :P5 /* {{MDTClosingBal}} */, :P6 /* {{GetMDtComm.transaction_type+' Reversal'}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, :P8 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P9 /* {{'Debit'}} */, :P10 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */, :P11 /* {{GetMDtComm.remarks}} */, :P12 /* {{identity}} */, :P13 /* {{NOW}} */)

UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{MDTClosingBal}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetTrInfo.md_id}} */
